sentence.Network_en: The Prime Minister smiled again, this time a trifle frostily.
sentence.Network_cn: 首相又笑了笑，这回有点儿冷冰冰的。

sentence.Network_en: He smiled frostily and deliberately turned away.
sentence.Network_cn: 他冷冷地笑了笑便故意转身走了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(55) ... frostfish 北美雪鱼 frostily 冷峻地 frostiness 酷寒.
2013年职称英语理工类练习题精选(1)_新东方网 ... Hollywood n. 好莱坞 frostily adv. 冷漠地 Greenland n. 格陵兰.

entry.def: If the weather is frosty, the temperature is below freezing.
You describe the ground or an object as frosty when it is covered with frost.

example.ex: The street was deserted except for a cat lifting its paws off the frosty stones.
example.tran: 街上空无一人，只有一只猫在结霜的石砖上拾爪而行。

entry.def: If you describe someone's behaviour as frosty, you think it is unfriendly.

example.ex: The president may get a frosty reception in New Hampshire...
example.tran: 总统在新罕布什尔州可能会受到冷遇。

example.ex: The relationship has obviously become frosty.
example.tran: 很明显关系已经变冷了。

sentences.sentence: "`Come in if you have to,' he said frostily"

auth_sentence.content: Beijing has responded frostily, stressing that the deployment may not be quite appropriate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Beijing has responded frostily, stressing that the deployment may not be quite appropriate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Beijing has responded frostily, stressing that the deployment may not be quite appropriate.
